title: Nostradamus' 2025 Predictions: Asteroid Collision To Plague-Like Outbreak
content: Though Nostradamus' prophecies more often than not miss the mark, they do provide a certain thrill to the people reading them.
summary: Though Nostradamus' prophecies more often than not miss the mark, they do provide a certain thrill to the people reading them.

title: 104 Journalists Killed In 2024, Over Half In Gaza: Report
content: The toll for 2024 is down on the 129 deaths in 2023 but still makes it "one of the worst years" on record, IFJ general secretary Anthony Bellanger told AFP.
summary: The toll for 2024 is down on the 129 deaths in 2023 but still makes it "one of the worst years" on record, IFJ general secretary Anthony Bellanger told AFP.

title: "Parasites...": Document Found With UnitedHealthcare CEO Murder Suspect
content: Luigi Mangione, the 26-year-old Ivy League graduate who is "person of interest" in the Manhattan killing of UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson, was reportedly carrying a manifesto railing against "corporate America" at the time of his arrest.
summary: Luigi Mangione, the 26-year-old Ivy League graduate who is "person of interest" in the Manhattan killing of UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson, was reportedly carrying a manifesto railing against "corporate America" at the time of his arrest.

title: Flirting With Receptionist Proves Costly For US Executive's Murder Suspect
content: US detectives have arrested a 26-year-old suspect - a former Ivy League student - from Pennsylvania after a nationwide manhunt over UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson's killing in New York.
summary: US detectives have arrested a 26-year-old suspect - a former Ivy League student - from Pennsylvania after a nationwide manhunt over UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson's killing in New York.

title: Human Rights Day 2024: Know Date, History, Theme And Significance
content: Human Rights Day 2024: The UN  has decided to dedicate the theme of Human Rights Day this year to "Our Rights, Our Future, Right Now".
summary: Human Rights Day 2024: The UN  has decided to dedicate the theme of Human Rights Day this year to "Our Rights, Our Future, Right Now".

title: Who Is Luigi Mangione, Man Behind UnitedHealthCare CEO's Murder
content: Luigi Mangione was detained in Altoona, Pennsylvania on Monday after he was found with a gun without a license, a silencer, and fake ID cards.
summary: Luigi Mangione was detained in Altoona, Pennsylvania on Monday after he was found with a gun without a license, a silencer, and fake ID cards.

title: UK Criminology Student Kills Woman To "Know What It Feels Like"
content: On the night of the stabbings, the two women were sitting on the sand where they had lit a fire and were watching the full moon.
summary: On the night of the stabbings, the two women were sitting on the sand where they had lit a fire and were watching the full moon.

title: Trump Nominates Indian-American Harmeet Dhillon For Top Civil Rights Post
content: US President-elect Donald Trump on Monday nominated Indian-American Harmeet K Dhillon as Assistant Attorney General for Civil Rights at the Department of Justice.
summary: US President-elect Donald Trump on Monday nominated Indian-American Harmeet K Dhillon as Assistant Attorney General for Civil Rights at the Department of Justice.

title: All About The British Indian Student Elected President Of Cambridge Union
content: Anoushka Kale has been elected president of the University of Cambridge's renowned Cambridge Union Society for the Easter term following an uncontested race.
summary: Anoushka Kale has been elected president of the University of Cambridge's renowned Cambridge Union Society for the Easter term following an uncontested race.

title: Israeli Warplanes Launch Over 100 Strikes On Syria Army Targets: Report
content: Israel conducted more than 100 air strikes on military targets in Syria on Monday including a research centre Western countries suspected of having links to chemical weapons production in Damascus, a war monitor said.
summary: Israel conducted more than 100 air strikes on military targets in Syria on Monday including a research centre Western countries suspected of having links to chemical weapons production in Damascus, a war monitor said.

title: Israeli Army In Golan Buffer Zone Violation Of 1974 Syria Agreement: UN
content: Israeli troops that have moved into the buffer zone on the edge of the Israeli-annexed Golan Heights "constitute a violation" of the 1974 disengagement agreement between Israel and Syria, a UN spokesman said Monday.
summary: Israeli troops that have moved into the buffer zone on the edge of the Israeli-annexed Golan Heights "constitute a violation" of the 1974 disengagement agreement between Israel and Syria, a UN spokesman said Monday.

title: Netanyahu To Testify In Corruption Trial For 1st Time Amid Israel Hamas War
content: Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu of Israel is set to take the stand on Tuesday for the first time in his long-running corruption trial under a court order that is likely to force him to juggle between the courtroom and war room for weeks.
summary: Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu of Israel is set to take the stand on Tuesday for the first time in his long-running corruption trial under a court order that is likely to force him to juggle between the courtroom and war room for weeks.

title: Ex-Ivy League Student, 26, Arrested For UnitedHealthcare CEO's Murder
content: A 26-year-old man was arrested Monday after the targeted killing of a top health insurance executive on the streets of New York, police said, crediting a McDonald's employee in Pennsylvania who spotted a suspicious-looking customer.
summary: A 26-year-old man was arrested Monday after the targeted killing of a top health insurance executive on the streets of New York, police said, crediting a McDonald's employee in Pennsylvania who spotted a suspicious-looking customer.

title: Hamas Will Attack Us Again If We End War Now, Says Israeli PM Netanyahu
content: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said Monday he would not stop the war in Gaza "now", with renewed efforts towards a ceasefire underway.
summary: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said Monday he would not stop the war in Gaza "now", with renewed efforts towards a ceasefire underway.

title: Israeli PM Says Occupied Golan Heights Will Remain Israeli "For Eternity"
content: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said Monday that the Golan Heights, occupied by Israel for almost 60 years, would remain Israeli "for eternity".
summary: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said Monday that the Golan Heights, occupied by Israel for almost 60 years, would remain Israeli "for eternity".

title: US Police Detain Man In Connection With UnitedHealth CEO's Murder: Reports
content: Authorities on Monday detained a man in central Pennsylvania in connection with last week's murder of UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson after finding him in possession of a gun, a silencer and false identification cards similar the killer.
summary: Authorities on Monday detained a man in central Pennsylvania in connection with last week's murder of UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson after finding him in possession of a gun, a silencer and false identification cards similar the killer.

title: US Sanctions Syrian Leader Bashar Al Assad's Father-In-Law
content: The US unveiled sanctions Monday against Bashar al-Assad's father-in-law, a day after the former Syrian president reportedly fled to Russia as rebels took over the capital Damascus.
summary: The US unveiled sanctions Monday against Bashar al-Assad's father-in-law, a day after the former Syrian president reportedly fled to Russia as rebels took over the capital Damascus.

title: Mexico Study Suggest Extreme Heat Greater Risk For Young People
content: Extreme heat poses a greater risk to younger populations than the elderly, according to a new analysis which revealed that 75 per cent of heat-related deaths in Mexico from 1998-2019 occurred among those aged under 35 years.
summary: Extreme heat poses a greater risk to younger populations than the elderly, according to a new analysis which revealed that 75 per cent of heat-related deaths in Mexico from 1998-2019 occurred among those aged under 35 years.

title: Assad's Fall An Opportunity To Rid Syria Of Chemical Weapons
content: The downfall of Syria's Bashar al-Assad, found to have used chemical weapons against his own people on multiple occasions during the civil war, creates an opportunity to rid the country of banned munitions, diplomatic sources said on Monday.
summary: The downfall of Syria's Bashar al-Assad, found to have used chemical weapons against his own people on multiple occasions during the civil war, creates an opportunity to rid the country of banned munitions, diplomatic sources said on Monday.

title: India's Russia-Made Warship Comes With Ukrainian Engines. How It Happened
content: Despite the years-long war between Russia and Ukraine, Moscow and Kiev worked separately for a common cause - to manufacture an Indian Navy warship, which was handed over to New Delhi on Monday when Defence Minister Rajnath Singh arrived in Moscow.
summary: Despite the years-long war between Russia and Ukraine, Moscow and Kiev worked separately for a common cause - to manufacture an Indian Navy warship, which was handed over to New Delhi on Monday when Defence Minister Rajnath Singh arrived in Moscow.
